headline: Is KKR & Co. (KKR) the best stock to buy as Wall Street analysts watch it closely?
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is among the stocks Wall Street analysts are watching closely. On November 10, TD Cowen reaffirmed the ‘Buy’ rating on KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR), while trimming the price target to $146 from $153, implying an upside of nearly 21%. This downward revision of the price target stems from near-term […]
